1.0.name: wordpress/fantasktic
1.0.description:
Fantasktic is a simple, secure way to fix any one thing WordPress for $99.

Submitting your request is free with no credit card required.

How it works We use proprietary technology and an awesome, expert team to review your request then have you approve the cost and timeline to complete your submitted request. Once approved we get to work and don't charge you a dime until you verify your request is completed and ready to go live.

What can we really fix for $99? We complete over 95% of WordPress technical support issues, updates, and basic feature requests for $99 including most host migrations, errors, and theme updates.

Migrations

  • Move to a new host
  • Problems after a migration
  • Server, hosting issues

Hacks and Errors

  • 404s on pages and posts
  • Can't get logged into your admin
  • Visible code
